parts.text: {"word":"misceo","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(ラテン語) 混ぜる、混合する、結合する","english_definition":"(Latin) to mix, mingle, blend, combine","examples":[{"sentence":"Vina miscere.","translation":"ワインを混ぜる。"},{"sentence":"Misceo colores.","translation":"色を混ぜる。"}],"collocations":["misceo + accusative (～を混ぜる)","misceo + ablative (～と混ぜる)"],"synonyms":["commisceo","misceō","permisceo","tempero","confundo"],"antonyms":["separo","divido","discerno"]}],"etymology":{"value":"印欧祖語の *misk- （混ぜる）に由来する。英語の mix や miscellaneous と同語源。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈmɪske.oː/","classical_latin":"/ˈmɪske.oː/ (approximately)","ecclesiastical_latin":"/ˈmiʃe.o/ (approximately)"},"inflection":{"conjugation":"第一活用 (First conjugation)","principal_parts":["misceō","miscēre","miscuī","mixtum or mistum"],"verb_forms":{"present_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"misceō","2nd_person_singular":"miscēs","3rd_person_singular":"miscet","1st_person_plural":"miscēmus","2nd_person_plural":"miscētis","3rd_person_plural":"miscent"},"imperfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"miscēbam","2nd_person_singular":"miscēbās","3rd_person_singular":"miscēbat","1st_person_plural":"miscēbāmus","2nd_person_plural":"miscēbātis","3rd_person_plural":"miscēbant"},"future_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"miscēbō","2nd_person_singular":"miscēbis","3rd_person_singular":"miscēbit","1st_person_plural":"miscēbimus","2nd_person_plural":"miscēbitis","3rd_person_plural":"miscēbunt"},"perfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"miscuī","2nd_person_singular":"miscuistī","3rd_person_singular":"miscuit","1st_person_plural":"miscuimus","2nd_person_plural":"miscuistis","3rd_person_plural":"miscuerunt"},"pluperfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"miscueram","2nd_person_singular":"miscuerās","3rd_person_singular":"miscuerat","1st_person_plural":"miscuerāmus","2nd_person_plural":"miscuerātis","3rd_person_plural":"miscuerant"},"future_perfect_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"miscuerō","2nd_person_singular":"miscueris","3rd_person_singular":"miscuerit","1st_person_plural":"miscuerimus","2nd_person_plural":"miscueritis","3rd_person_plural":"miscuerint"},"present_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"miscem","2nd_person_singular":"miscēs","3rd_person_singular":"miscet","1st_person_plural":"miscēmus","2nd_person_plural":"miscētis","3rd_person_plural":"miscent"},"imperfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"miscērem","2nd_person_singular":"miscērēs","3rd_person_singular":"miscēret","1st_person_plural":"miscērēmus","2nd_person_plural":"miscērētis","3rd_person_plural":"miscērent"},"perfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"miscuerim","2nd_person_singular":"miscueris","3rd_person_singular":"miscuerit","1st_person_plural":"miscuerimus","2nd_person_plural":"miscueritis","3rd_person_plural":"miscuerint"},"pluperfect_subjunctive":{"1st_person_singular":"miscuissem","2nd_person_singular":"miscuissēs","3rd_person_singular":"miscuisset","1st_person_plural":"miscuissemus","2nd_person_plural":"miscuissetis","3rd_person_plural":"miscuissent"},"present_infinitive":"miscēre","perfect_infinitive":"miscuisse","future_infinitive":"mixtūrus esse","present_participle":"miscēns","future_participle":"mixtūrus","gerund":"miscendum","gerundive":"miscendus"}}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「misceo」はラテン語の基本的な動詞で、物理的な混合だけでなく、抽象的な意味での結合や混乱も表すことがあります。派生語も多く、英語の語彙にも影響を与えています。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ Misceo cum.","correct":"✓ Misceo + accusative (目的語を直接とる)","note":"「～と混ぜる」という場合は、前置詞 cum ではなく、ablative格を用いるか、cum + ablative の形で表現します。"}],"priority":"★☆☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["mixtus (形容詞: 混ぜられた、混合した)","mistura (名詞: 混合、混合物)","promiscuus (形容詞: 無差別の、乱雑な、混ざった)","conmiscere (動詞: 完全に混ぜる)","admiscere (動詞: 加えて混ぜる)","immiscere (動詞: 中に混ぜる)","permiscere (動詞: 完全に混ぜる)"],"english_cognates":["mix","miscible","mixture","miscellaneous","medley"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"level":"大学ラテン語","frequency_latin_texts":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency) - 古典ラテン語のテキストによく見られる。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「misceo」はラテン語の動詞で、「混ぜる」「混合する」という意味です。第一活用に属し、様々な形に活用します。派生語も多く、英語の語彙にも影響を与えています。古典ラテン語のテキストを読む際に頻繁に遭遇する単語です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Aqua et vinum miscentur.","translation":"水とワインは混ぜられる。","type":"verb (passive)","meaning_category":"混ぜる"},{"sentence":"Misce consilia cum ratione.","translation":"思慮を理性と混ぜ合わせよ（知恵と理性を働かせよ）。","type":"verb (figurative)","meaning_category":"混合する (比喩)"}]}
